synopsis.text:
From the heartwarming 'Minna no Uta' series of NHK, comes a touching music video that beautifully captures the essence of a mother's love. The story revolves around a single mother who dedicates her life to nurturing and cherishing her only son. Their bond is a testament to the power of love and togetherness, as they explore the world around them, from playful moments in the park to leisurely strolls down the city streets. This poignant tale is brought to life by the talented Mochizuki Tomomi, renowned for his work on 'Futatsu no Spica' and 'Zettai Shounen', who masterfully crafts a visual spectacle that will tug at your heartstrings and leave you in awe. Prepare to embark on an emotional journey that celebrates the unbreakable bond between a mother and her child.
